item.title: Study: Rate Of Serious Or Life-Threatening Complications After Abortion Pill Is 22 Times Higher Than FDA Claims
item.description: ‘Women deserve better than the abortion pill,’ the researchers conclude.

item.title: Trump says 'disruptors' at GOP town hall events should be 'immediately ejected': 'Troublemakers'

item.title: Hawley reignites 'PELOSI Act' push to ban lawmakers from trading stocks
item.description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., reintroduced his "PELOSI Act" seeking to ban lawmakers from making stock trades while they are in office on Monday.

item.title: Adventures in Israeli Cuisine
item.description: My falafel may have failed, but the rest of my dinner, with dishes based on ones I had tried in Israel, was fragrant and flavorful.
